name: CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_END
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Support & Services Provided Audit Trail - End Date (I HSB 64142) item.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical support and service type information in the episode record. Together with EPISODE_ID, this forms the foreign key for CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the end date in the snapshot of the support and services audit trail (SI HSB 64140) and associated with the support and service type in CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX.

columns.name: SSP_END_DATE
columns.description: The end date of historical support and service type information.
